about_the_game:
Background

To hone your skills, your father, the district chief, used a bit of influence to make you the manager of Zone 21 in the Blackrock Cave and set a small goal for you: to earn one hundred million. You need to diligently manage Zone 21 and devise ways to earn money from adventurers.

About this game

Journey of Harvest is a top-down simulation building game that combines planting, automation, adventure, tower defense combat and other special elements. Players control the protagonist to embark on a delightful journey through the game.

Automation

Raw materials are put into the production equipment to make the corresponding items. Based on this principle, assembling an automated production line and waiting for some time can make a lot of needed items. What? Don't want to wait too long? Just sleep in the game and wait for the next day.

Permutation and Combination

Journey of Harvest have 50 different types of turrets. Players can freely combine them and fuse their special attributes.

For example:

(1) Blast Turret- Bullets fired will explode when they hit an enemy and cause damage to surrounding enemies;

(2) Frozen Turret - Bullets will freeze enemies for 3 seconds and slow them down by 75%.

Combine the two turrets to fire the Frozen Blaster. Enemies within the range are subjected to the freezing and slowing effect.

Another example:

(1) Tracking Turret - Bullets will auto-solo the enemy.

(2) Penetrating Turret - Bullets penetrate the enemy.

The combination of the two turrets fires a penetrating bullet that automatically traces the enemy.

If you find two turret combinations less playable, try an infinite combination of turrets! Combine multiple attributes in one.

Explore

Ancient secrets lie beneath the mines. Upgrade your equipment, hire more adventurers or assemble more robots and venture into the mines to collect rare ores and gems, build fortifications against the endless attacks of the mysterious Underground Guard, and reap the random rewards of each round to buy more time for the miners.

Planting

Area 21 was contaminated years ago, and while the surface land is not suitable for planting, we can use planters to grow, clear out an area, place planters (no need to place planters on the roof as there are no zombies attacking the area), plant fruits and veggies, water or place an automated watering device, and harvest the crops.

Magical props

In the game, you can create many magical items, some of which possess powerful functions, while others have humorous uses. For example:

  • Half-Life Timer - This device can accurately time events for one thousand years and comes with a timed blinking alarm.

  • Plant Growth Potion - This potion allows plants to instantly bloom and bear fruit.

  • Adaptive Color Ballpen - Using image recognition technology, this ballpen judges the color of the paper and automatically changes its ink color to match.

  • Peek-a-Boo Time Viewer - This device allows you to see past scenes and hidden Easter eggs.

...and many more!

Technology

On this planet, there are many unexplained strange phenomena such as mysterious dreams, people at a standstill in time, cities flying in the air, disappearing stones, and so on. Through the power of technology, they are discovered, explained, and applied to gain knowledge.

Living area

The adventurers all live in the residential area of the Blackrock Cave. Hire some residents to work for you and pay them a salary, or find ways to make them forget about "not receiving payment." Of course, opening a few shops is also a good option.

Market

With the deepening of research, more magical commodities can be developed. The prices of raw materials for manufacturing commodities will change subtly with the supply and demand in the market, so choosing the right time to purchase resources and manufacture commodities can reap higher profits.

Construction

You can build large, exclusive rooms on the surface to research technology, develop goods, and produce equipment and machines; you can also deploy all kinds of equipment, robotic arms, conveyor belts, and even teleports to automate production. You can also build high-efficiency facilities underground to produce all kinds of basic resources, processing resources, weapon parts, prosthetic parts, etc., and even use magic props to manipulate the flow of time in the region.

Ruins

During the adventure, I believe you will discover some relics and items that may help you understand the past and gain the truth of history.

name: Journey of Harvest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Your father, who is the district chief, has appointed you as the manager of Zone 21 in the Blackrock Cave and set a small goal for you: earn one hundred million. Try every means possible to earn funds from adventurers and enjoy this journey of reaping rewards.
